job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtwho we are ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtfounded by veteran business executive noosheen hashemi and director of genomics and personalized medicine at stanford university dr michael snyder and backed by silicon valley luminaries jerry yang marc benioff and steve chen january ai is the first precision health company that combines heart rate and continuous glucose monitors sleep and activity tracking and seamless meal logging including inferred calorie and fiber consumption drawing from a proprietary atlas of m foods to give you a complete picture of your metabolic wellbeing and nudge you towards better habits in just daysfrom predicting which foods you should eat and avoid to when a brisk walk or overnight fast can bring your blood sugar back into a healthy rangeltbrgtltbrgtcheck out our recent coverage in stat techcrunch new york times and venturebeatltbrgtltbrgtat january ai we believe that every day is january st that every day is a fresh start we believe that health isnt a place you reach but the simple process of doing just a little better than yesterday we believe that selfimprovement is a team sport thats why january ai is creating a community of everyday people building their healthy habits together january ai is backed among others by marc benioff jerry yang and steve chen founders of salesforce yahoo and youtube if youre ready to join our team and help grow this community please submit your application following the link providedltbrgtltbrgtposition overviewltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for an experienced machine learning ml engineer with practical experience utilizing deep learning methods and tools as part of the machine learning team at january ai you would be working on various ai initiatives including investigating and implementing models and algorithms to predict biomedical and behavioral quantities from unstructured biomedical and user generated data and work closely with the engineering team to release ml features based on your models to the january ai platform you would collaborate with the product team to influence future roadmaps for mldriven features on the january ai platform and would apply your ml expertise to develop models that improve our existing mldriven productsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt roles and responsibilities ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtdesign and implement models using deep learning and other machine learning algorithms and techniquesltligtltligtleverage deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques to enhance the existing app featuresltligtltligtdevelop prototypes for new featuresservices and deliver reliable machine learning features for deploymentltligtltligtmanipulate and analyze complex highvolume high dimensionality data from multiple sourcesltligtltligtdeliver endtoend scalable performant and reliable machine learning features in productionltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggt required qualifications ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtadvanced degree ms phd in computer science electrical and computer engineering or other fields related to machine learning ltligtltligt years of industry experience or equivalent research experienceltligtltligtprolific experience writing deep learning and other machine learning algorithms and workflows in pythonltligtltligtdeep theoretical and practical experience with a number of ml techniques and frameworks such as deep neural networks rnn cnn ae gan transformers etcltligtltligtproficiency at coding and debugging workflows written using deep learning frameworks such as pytorch keras andor tensorflowltligtltligtpractical experience with software engineering practices eg unit testing code reviews design documentationltligtltligtbe driven to deliver impactful consumerfocused solutionsltligtltulgtnice to haveltbrgtltulgtltligtprior working experience with healthcare wearable device andor human subject dataltligtltligtprevious work implementing recommender systems in a productltbrgtltligtltulgtwed love to hear from youltbrgtltbrgtjanuary is an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtwe are a diverse team and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employeesltbrgtltbrgtour hq office is located in sunny and beautiful downtown menlo park ca walking distance to caltrain and local cafes and restaurantsltbrgtltbrgtlocal or west coastbased candidates preferredltbrgtltbrgtbenefits and perks of working fulltime at january include competitive salary and equity packages k with corporate matching health dental vision life and adampampd insurance commuter benefitsltbrgtltbrgtwe do not accept thirdparty solicitation for employment
